Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper

Class MiniZooKeeperCluster

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.MiniZooKeeperCluster
@Public public class MiniZooKeeperCluster extends Object
TODO: Most of the code in this class is ripped from ZooKeeper tests. Instead of redoing it, we should contribute updates to their code which let us more easily access testing helper objects.

      private int selectClientPort(int seedPort)
      Selects a ZK client port.
      Parameters:
      seedPort - the seed port to start with; -1 means first time.
      Returns:
      a valid and unused client port

    • startup

      public int startup(File baseDir, int numZooKeeperServers) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Parameters:
      baseDir - the base directory to use
      numZooKeeperServers - the number of ZooKeeper servers
      Returns:
      ClientPort server bound to, -1 if there was a binding problem and we couldn't pick another port.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an operation fails during the startup
      InterruptedException - if the startup fails

    • killCurrentActiveZooKeeperServer

      public int killCurrentActiveZooKeeperServer() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Returns:
      clientPort return clientPort if there is another ZK backup can run when killing the current active; return -1, if there is no backups.
      Throws:
      IOException - if waiting for the shutdown of a server fails
      InterruptedException
